prodNameC: 常盈C反應蛋白酵素免疫分析法
ingredientsDesc: REAGENTS A. Anti-US CRP Antibody-Coated Microtitration Strips:One stripholder, containing 96 polystyrene microtiter wells with rabbit, anti-US CRP antibody immobilized to the inside wall of each well.B. US CRP Standards:One vial, 42 mL, labeled A, containing 0 ng/mL, US CRP and five vials, 0.5 mL each labeled  B-F, containing concentrations of approximately 10, 30, 100, 250 and 500 ng/mL US CRP in a protein-based buffer with a non-mercury preservative.C. US CRP ControlsTwo vials, 50 mL, Levels I and II, containing low and high concentrations of US CRP in a protein-based buffer with non-mercury preservative.D. US CRP Antibody-Enzyme Conjugate ConcentrateOne vial, containing 0.3 mL of a solution of US CRP antibody conjugated to horseradish peroxidase in a buffer with a non-mercury preservative.E. Assay Buffer BTwo bottles, 28 mL each, containing a protein based (BSA)-buffer with a non-mercury preservative.  F. TMB Chromogen SolutionOne vial, 11 mL, containing a solution of tetramethylbenzidine (TMB) in citrate
applicantName: 常盈實業股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市北投區永興路一段49號
efficacy: 利用酵素免疫定量方法檢測血清或血漿中的CRP。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
